```{r}
# Load in Packages
library(tidyverse)
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(knitr)
library(openintro)
library(mosaicData)
library(tibble)
```

```{r}
# Insert Data
culture_data <- tibble(
  country = c("Hungary", "Turkey"),
  thrift = c(40.8, 36.4),
  hard_work = c(66.2, 62.3)
)
culture_data

# Bar Plot
# Pivot to long format
culture_long <- culture_data |>
  pivot_longer(cols = c(thrift, hard_work),
               names_to = "quality",
               values_to = "percent")

# Plot
ggplot(culture_long, aes(x = country, y = percent, fill = quality)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity", position = "dodge") +
  labs(title = "Importance of Thrift and Hard Work (By Country)",
       x = "Country",
       y = "% of Respondents") +
  scale_fill_manual(values = c("thrift" = "lightblue", "hard_work" = "steelblue")) 
```

```{r}
education_data <- tibble(
  country = c("Hungary", "Turkey"),
  total = c(31.5, 20.9),
  male = c(30, 22.8),
  female = c(32.9, 19.1)
)
education_data

education_long <- education_data |>
  pivot_longer(cols = c(total, male, female),
               names_to = "demographic",
               values_to = "percent")

ggplot(education_long, aes(x = country, y = percent, fill = demographic)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity", position = "dodge") +
  labs(title = "% of Population That at Least Completed Secondary Education (By Country)",
       x = "Country",
       y = "% of Population") +
  scale_fill_manual(values = c("total" = "lightgreen", "male" = "steelblue", "female" = "lightpink")) 
```
